aggregate_strength.note: Aggregate estimate for September 1941 based on November data (140 aircraft, 76 operational on 15 November). II./JG 27 arrived 14 September, strengthening fighter forces. Reinforcement from Greece available (Fliegerkorps X: 181 aircraft, 104 operational).
aggregate_strength.data_source: Operation Crusader battle records extrapolated to Q3

sources: Wikipedia - Operation Crusader (15 November 1941 strength: 140 aircraft, 76 operational)
metadata.notes: Estimated strength for September 1941 based on documented November data (140 aircraft, 76 operational at Operation Crusader start). Serviceability rate ~54% typical for Luftwaffe in North Africa. II./JG 27 arrived mid-September, increasing fighter strength. Fliegerkorps X in Greece (181 aircraft) available for reinforcement. Exact unit-level breakdown not available in free sources.
